type18grenadelauncher.configgui.category: This is where you can edit the client-side settings contained in type18grenadelauncher.cfg.
This is where you can edit the settings contained in type18grenadelauncher.cfg.
Settings of gun sight on HUD.
Setting of HE 40 mm Grenade Cartridge.
Setting of HE 51 mm Grenade Cartridge.
Settings of 40 mm Revolver Grenade Launcher.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.enableHU: Enable to draw gun sight on HUD.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.sightHUD: Set value of color (ARGB8888 format in 32-bit signed integer) for gun sight.
Set values of angles in degrees for gun sight.
Set strings of range for gun sight.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.detonate: Detonate grenade when it cannot be updated by unloaded chunks.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.enableLo: Enable to log grenade's launching and detonating.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.grenadeD: Set grenade's damage (0: none, 1: entities, 2: terrain and entities).
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.goThroug: Grenades go through the blocks which have zero hardness.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.grenade4: Set explosive power of HE 40 mm Grenade Cartridge.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.grenade5: Set explosive power of HE 51 mm Grenade Cartridge.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.launcher: Set cool-down time of reloading 40 mm Grenade Launcher in ticks.
Set cool-down time of firing 40 mm Revolver Grenade Launcher in ticks.
Set cool-down time of reloading 40 mm Revolver Grenade Launcher in ticks.
type18grenadelauncher.configgui.mortar51: Set cool-down time of reloading 51 mm Light Mortar in ticks.
